content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to the Eurogamer's archive of interviews, but I can provide you with some examples of notable interviews conducted by Eurogamer over the years:

- Hideo Kojima: The legendary game designer and creator of the Metal Gear series was interviewed by Eurogamer in 2011, where he discussed his creative process, influences, and the future of the industry.

- Shigeru Miyamoto: The Nintendo icon and creator of famous franchises like Mario and The Legend of Zelda, was interviewed by Eurogamer in 2014, discussing his views on the current state of the industry, approaches to game development and his origins in gaming.

- Phil Spencer: Head of Xbox, Phil Spencer was interviewed by Eurogamer in multiple occasions, sharing his vision for the Xbox brand and the future of gaming, as well as discussing the company's approach to exclusives and partnerships.

- Cory Barlog: The Game Director for 2018's God of War, Barlog was interviewed by Eurogamer during the development of the game, discussing his take on the franchise, its evolution and challenges in modern game development.

- Tim Schafer: The iconic game designer and founder of Double Fine Productions, Schafer was recently interviewed by Eurogamer discussing the upcoming Psychonauts 2 among other topics related to his creative work over the years.
